translation: Those deluded by the qualities of Nature are attached to the functions of the qualities. The man of perfect knowledge should not unsettle the foolish one who is of imperfect knowledge.
commentary: 3.29 of nature of nature? persons deluded by the Gunas? Sajjante are attached? in the functions of the alities? tan those? Akritsnavidah of imperfect knowledge? Mandan the foolish (thedullwitted)? kritsnavit man of perfect knowledge? Not not? Vichalayet should unsettle.Commentary The ignorant people do action with the expectation of fruits. The wise people who have the knowledge
